QueryViewSpec.Name: Our Custom Queries In RelatedViews Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Displays queries where our customizations are in RelatedViews.
QueryViewSpec.Author: Mark Sellers

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL: -- this is to get the RelatedView queries: WITH XMLNAMESPACES ('bb_appfx_queryview' AS x) , cteQueryDefXml as ( SELECT ID, DISPLAYNAME, OBJECTNAME, [DESCRIPTION], QUERYVIEWSPEC.value('(/x:QueryViewSpec/@RecordType)[1]','nvarchar(max)') as RecordType, --p.value('./@ParentView', 'nvarchar(max)') as ParentView, --p.value('./@PathAlias', 'nvarchar(max)') as ParentPathAlias, r.value('./@RelatedView', 'nvarchar(max)') as RelatedView, r.value('./@PathAlias', 'nvarchar(max)') as RelatedPathAlias FROM dbo.QUERYVIEWCATALOG --dbo.adhocquery --cross apply QUERYVIEWSPEC.nodes('/x:QueryViewSpec/x:RelationshipOperations/x:AddToParentView') as x(p) cross apply QUERYVIEWSPEC.nodes('/x:QueryViewSpec/x:RelationshipOperations/x:AddRelatedView') as s(r) where OBJECTNAME like '%USR%' ) select distinct (case when a.NAME is null then DISPLAYNAME else a.NAME end) as QueryName, ObjectName, RecordType, RelatedPathAlias, RelatedView from cteQueryDefXml left join dbo.ADHOCQUERY a on a.QUERYVIEWCATALOGID = cteQueryDefXml.ID left join dbo.QUERYCATEGORYCODE c on c.ID = a.QUERYCATEGORYCODEID --order by (case when a.NAME is null then DISPLAYNAME else a.NAME end);
